title: Tim Buckley 1960s record cover typeface
content:
A friend asked me to ID this typeface, but since it's from a record cover from 1969 it must be from before my time :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724015245im_/http:/typophile.com/files/happy_sad_3963.jpg)

WhatTheFont also doesn't know.

Any ideas?

Thanks,  
Jens

Edit: here's a bigger image:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724015245im_/http:/typophile.com/files/happy_sad_big_3418.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [happy\_sad.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724015245/http:/typophile.com/files/happy_sad.jpg) | 6.43 KB |
author: Jens Kutilek

comments.content: It's similar to ITC Tiffany, but certainly not the same. If you're looking for something close, might be a good place to start.
